data.title: Department of Cannabis Control Proposes Consolidation of Cannabis Regulations
data.excerpt: Emergency rulemaking action would create a single set of regulations for commercial cannabis activity in California SACRAMENTO, CA â€“ The Department of Cannabis Control (DCC) today published proposed emergency regulations. This action follows those taken in July by DCC to move all cannabis regulations into Title 4 of the California Code of Regulations. This is […]
data.author: Christina Dempsey
